flawed_nl_solution:
Bob has 5 rows of corn, each with 80 corn stalks, so he has 5 rows * 80 stalks per row = <<5*80=4000>>4000 corn stalks.
4000 corn stalks will produce a bushel of corn, so Bob will harvest 4000 corn stalks / 8 corn stalks per bushel = <<4000/8=500>>500 bushels of corn.
#### 500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
